rooms.description: Open space with Vastu-aligned entrance, incorporating large windows for natural light and ventilation.
Spacious living area facing north-east to harness positive energy as per Vastu principles, with multiple openings ensuring ample natural light and cross-ventilation.
Adjacent to the living area; large windows on one side for natural lighting and ventilation. Vastu-aligned placement in the south-east direction.
Chef's kitchen with ample natural light from north-facing windows; includes a small pantry area as per Chettinad design aesthetics.
A guest room ensuring privacy and calm ambiance, with openings that allow natural ventilation.
Dedicated home office space located in a quiet corner; large window to ensure proper lighting and air flow as per Vastu considerations.
Spacious master bedroom with large south-west facing window for natural light, aligned per Vastu recommendations for calm and restful energy.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy; includes cross-ventilation openings on the south side.
Another bedroom designed for family members, with east-facing windows to invite positive energy as per Vastu principles.
Third bedroom with ample natural lighting and ventilation; Vastu-aligned south-east orientation for a balanced environment.
Alternate home office space in the penthouse, designed to offer a panoramic view and abundant natural light; integrated with modern Chettinad aesthetics.
Lounge area with high ceilings, large windows on all sides to maximize natural light and ventilation, Vastu-aligned for positive energy flow.

garage.description: Dual car garage integrated into the design with direct access to the main building while adhering to local building norms.
